Trade/Device Name(s): Easy Talk Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Easy Talk Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model: 6277
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Easy Talk Blood Glucose Monitoring System, a Class II meter for quantitative glucose measurement with audible results for users with low vision
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and forearm, for monitoring diabetes control by healthcare professionals and patients at home, not for diagnosis or screening or use with neonates
